CustomField.description:
NICC-026472
E-mail address used as the "From" when sending invoices that are related to this Remittance Info record
CustomField.inlineHelpText: E-mail address used as the "From" when sending invoices that are related to this Remittance Info record - this must match the name of a valid Org-Wide Email Address in Setup.
CustomField.label: OWA Name
